comments: Also number of integer solutions to a^2 +2*b^2 + 4*c^2 + 8*d^2 = n.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p 102 eq 9.
links: J. Liouville, Sur la forme x^2 + 2y^2 + 4z^2 + 8t^2, Journal de mathématiques pures et appliquées 2e série, tome 6 (1861), p. 409-416.
formula: Liouville gives an explicit formula for a(n).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
